hero.title: Hedamo Services
hero.headline: Country-Ready Transparency Programs
hero.subtext: Tailored engagements for governments, agencies, and producers—aligned with national goals and trade pathways.

intro.title: How We Work
paragraphs: We partner with ministries and nominated entities to localize Hedamo for national objectives—food security, consumer protection, and export growth.
Every deployment uses the same transparent engine: Hedamo Report, Hedamo AI, and Hedamo Code—adapted to your goals and programs.
